titleStmt.title: Good counsell, to the petitioners for Presbyterian government, that they may declare their faith before they build their church.
titleStmt.author: Chidley, Katherine.

notesStmt.note: Signed at foot: K.C. (i.e. Katherine Chidley).
Annotations on Thomason copy: "hidley" after 'K.C' at foot of titlepage; "Nouemb: 1st 1645".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
